projects.title: Federated Learning Security Portfolio
projects.description: A comprehensive 30-project portfolio exploring federated learning security. Features 165,000+ lines of code covering fraud detection, adversarial attacks, defensive mechanisms, and the novel SignGuard defense system achieving 94.5% detection rate.
achievements: 30 projects across 5 categories: Fraud Detection, FL Foundations, Adversarial Attacks, Defensive Techniques, Security Research
SignGuard: Novel ECDSA-based defense with 94.5% detection rate, 3.2% false positives
165,000+ LOC with 150+ test files and comprehensive documentation
9.6/10 average quality score across all projects

projects.title: FedPhish: Federated Phishing Detection Portfolio
projects.description: A 21-day intensive portfolio focused on privacy-preserving federated phishing detection. Includes production-grade system with 461 tests, React dashboard, and research paper on ZKP-based verification.
achievements: 21 projects implementing privacy-preserving ML for phishing detection
Zero-Knowledge Proof integration for verifiable federated learning
Production system with React dashboard and comprehensive API

projects.title: Production AI Portfolio
projects.description: Enterprise-grade portfolio showcasing production-ready AI systems including RAG applications (95% accuracy, <500ms latency), LangGraph agents, LLMOps pipelines, and scalable infrastructure.
achievements: Complete LLMOps stack with monitoring, evaluation, and A/B testing

projects.title: Macroeconomic Forecasting with Deep Learning
projects.description: Developed hybrid CNN-LSTM and GRU-LSTM architectures for multi-step GDP forecasting using 26 years of Indonesian macroeconomic data (1997-2023).
achievements: Achieved 9.83 RMSE through systematic hyperparameter optimization
Cross-model benchmarking against traditional statistical methods

projects.title: Quantitative Stock Analysis & Prediction System
projects.description: Built end-to-end pipeline for all IDX-listed stocks: data collection, technical indicator computation (RSI, MACD, EMA, ATR), and ML-based price prediction.
achievements: Implemented ensemble models (Random Forest, XGBoost, LSTM)
Built backtesting framework for strategy validation
